name: Saigon Discovery -  life, culture, and history! Enjoy one day like a Saigonese!
description: As a Saigonese, spent my childhood, adult, learning, working in Saigon, with me, Saigon as the first love, dwells in me forever. I understand Saigon like understanding about a beautiful girl - my first lover. I can show Saigon under my eye. During one day of exploring with me, you will understand some aspects of life in Saigon, culture and history here, as well as a bit of Saigon culinary
